slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Play by guessing the ball that will appear in the rotating cage. There are 24 balls numbered 1 to 24 in red and black.

slide-2.title: Placing Bets
content: You can place various betting options, such as Odd/Even, Big/Small, Split, Corner, Row, Column bets, and more.

slide-3.title: Result
content: The result is determined after the ball stops spinning in the cage. Bets matching the outcome will win.
